decision_conditions:
That condition 2 (approved plans) is amended as follows:

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

A207-A-(00)P001; A207-A-(00)P002; A207-A-(00)P020; A207-A-(00)P031; A207-A-(00)P032; A207-A-(00)P033; A207-A-(00)P101; A207-A-(00)P102; A207-A-(00)P103; A207-A-(00)P106; A207-A-(00)P120; A207-A-(00)P130; A207-A-(00)P201; A207-A-(00)P202; A207-A-(00)P203 A207-A-(00)P301; A207-A-(00)P302; A207-A-(00)P303; A207-A-(01)P002; A207-A-(01)P020 P01; A207-A-(01)P031; A207-A-(01)P032; A207-A-(01)P033; A207-A-(01)P101_03; A207-A-(01)P102_02; A207-A-(01)P103_01; A207-A-(01)P104_01; A207-A-(01)P106 rev 01; A207-A-(01)P107 P01; A207-A-(01)P108 P01; A207-A-(01)P109 P01; A207-A-(01)P110 P01; A207-A-(01)P111 P01; A207-A-(01)P112 P01; A207-A-(01)P113 P01; A207-A-(01)P202 P01 A207-A-(01)P120 P01; FSB-VER-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-07100 S3 rev 2; FSB-VER-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-07101 S3 Rev 2; FSB-VER-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-07102 S3 rev 2; FSB-VER-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-07103 S3 rev 2; FSB-VER-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-07104 S3 rev 2; FSB-VER-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-07105 S3 rev 2; 2015-2389-AT-112; 2015-2389-DWG-113; 2015-2389-AT-109 Rev A; 2015-2389-AT-110 Rev A; 2015-2389-AT-111; 2015-2389A-AT-106 Rev A; 2015-2389A-AT-109 Rev A; 2015-2389A-AT-111 Rev A; Topological Survey. Ventilation/Extraction Statement, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated July 2015; Statement of Community Involvement, prepared by Hardhat, dated June 2015; Health Impact Screening Assessment, prepared by DP9, dated July 2015; Construction Noise and Vibration Statement, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated July 2015; Acoustic Report, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated July 2015; Transport Assessment and Travel Plan, prepared by TTP Consulting, dated July 2015; ; Geotechnical Investigation and Land Contamination Report, prepared by Soiltechnics, dated July 2015; Air Quality Management Plan, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated 09/07/2015; Arboricultural Impact Assessment and Tree Protection Plan, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated 24/06/2015; Planning Statement, prepared by DP9, dated July 2015; Extended Phase 1 Habitat Survey, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated 26/06/2015;  Utilities Statement, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated July 2015; Flood Risk Assessment rev B, prepared by Heyne Tillet Steel, dated 14/07/2015; Structural Report rev C, prepared by Heyne Tillet Steel, dated 14/07/2015; Townscape, Heritage and Visual Impact Assessment, prepared by Tavernor Consultancy, dated July 2015; Proposed Construction Management Plan for Monmouth House Redevelopment, prepared by Brookfield Multiplex, undated but sent 30/09/2015; Energy Statement, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated September 2015; Response to Energy Officer's Internal Advice, dated 11/09/15; District Heating and cooling feasibility study, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated 19/09/2015; Response to comments from Statutory Consultees and local residents, prepared by DP9 dated September 2015; Monmouth House Potential Wind Effects letter from WSP, dated 12 October 2015, Design note DN01: Monmouth House: Response to comments from London Borough of Islington, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff dated 18 September 2015; Daylight and sunlight report, prepared by GIA, dated 25 August 2015 (Sent 12 October 2015)

Reason: To comply with Section 70(1) (a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Non material amendment to planning permission ref. P2015/3136/FUL, dated 1 April 2016, for the demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of the site to provide a building of part 10 and part 11 storeys fronting City Road and 5 storeys fronting Featherstone Street, to provide 13,393 sq.m of office floorspace (B1) including small/micro workspace; 404 sq.m of retail floorspace (A1); together with ancillary hard and soft landscaping, revised vehicular access/egress, 302 cycle spaces, one disabled vehicular space, refuse/service arrangements and all other works associated with the development. The proposed amendments relate to a variation of condition 2 (approved plans) pertaining to alterations to flues and parapets at roof level and balustrades and louvres on the elevations
